log.headline: Released HTCA Tools v1.0.0 - Production launch of Repo Radar + GAR
details: Released Repo Radar v1.0.0 with velocity-based discovery (19 repos found with 0 stars, highest velocity: 2737.5 from MAwaisNasim/lynx)
Released GAR v1.0.0 with IPFS/Arweave archiving and 13 secret detection patterns
Deployed both tools to temple_core (tony_studio@192.168.1.195) with 24-hour production validation
Achieved 6/6 passing unit tests and all verification checks (--verify-db, --verify-feeds)
Added database migration system with pushed_at field, XML parsing upgrade (xml.etree.ElementTree), and cross-shell compatibility
Created DEPLOYMENT.md and VERIFICATION.md documentation for audit-grade protocols
Measured reproducible performance: 2.67M calcs/sec, 0.37Î¼s median latency on benchmarks
